mapper.select: SELECT CHILD_NO, CHILD_NAME, (SELECT CLASS_NAME FROM CLASS_INFO WHERE CLASS_NO = A.CLASS_NO) AS CLASS_NAME, CHILD_AGE, CASE WHEN CHILD_GENDER = 'M' THEN '남자' WHEN CHILD_GENDER = 'W' THEN '여자' ELSE '' END AS CHILD_GENDER, TO_CHAR(CHILD_REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHILD_REG_DT FROM CHILD_INFO A WHERE CHILD_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY CHILD_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHILD_INFO ( CHILD_NO, CHILD_NAME, CHILD_GENDER, CHILD_AGE, CLASS_NO, CHILD_REG_DT ) VALUES ( CHILD_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{childName}, #{childGender}, #{childAge}, #{classNo}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT CHILD_NO, CHILD_NAME, (SELECT CLASS_NAME FROM CLASS_INFO WHERE CLASS_NO = A.CLASS_NO) AS CLASS_NAME, CLASS_NO, CHILD_AGE, CASE WHEN CHILD_GENDER = 'M' THEN '남자' WHEN CHILD_GENDER = 'W' THEN '여자' ELSE '' END AS CHILD_GENDER, TO_CHAR(CHILD_REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHILD_REG_DT FROM CHILD_INFO A WHERE CHILD_NO = #{childNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE CHILD_INFO SET CHILD_DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE CHILD_NO = #{childNo}
UPDATE CHILD_INFO SET CHILD_NAME = #{childName}, CHILD_AGE = #{childAge}, CHILD_GENDER = #{childGender}, CLASS_NO = #{classNo} WHERE CHILD_NO = #{childNo}
